main.name: Qian Zhong

main.bio: Four months work term experience as Data Analyst and React Full stack developer; Two years working experience in the Security testing field and experience in Git, Burpsuit, Python; Half year working experience as front end developer and experience in JavaScript, React, CSS, Html, Git; Successfully published four patents. They are related to Security, Testing, Machine Learning
